attributes.action: Back and push St Helens council,for World Champions St Helens RLFC to have there new stadium built asap.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: St Helens are World club Champions again,Won The Super League Grand Final Again,Won The Challenge Cup Again,Where League Leaders Again,Had a clean sweep at the BBC sports awards with Team Of the year,Coach of the year amongst other awards,After all the achievements this club has given us this year and in past years,we deserve a new World Class Stadium for a World Class Club.Not only would this benefit the Club but would benefit St Helens leisure And tourism,by attracting concerts and venues to a quality stadium.The Mighty Saints Need your help.
